korelaerernePage.title: Meet Our Driving Instructors
korelaerernePage.subtitle: Professional and Dedicated Instructors
korelaerernePage.description: Our team of experienced driving instructors is here to guide you every step of the way on your journey to getting your driver's license. We provide personalized instruction to ensure you feel confident and well-prepared for both the theory and practical driving tests.

contactPage.title: Contact us
contactPage.contactPrompt: We’re ready to help if you have questions about our courses, pricing or process.
contactPage.ambitionMessage: Call or email us – we’ll get back to you quickly.

contactForm.title: Questions about driving courses or licenses?

bil-korekort.title: Car Driving License
bil-korekort.subtitle: (Category B)
bil-korekort.hero: Get your car license with us – safe, fast and effective.
bil-korekort.cta: Ready to get your car driving license?
bil-korekort.body:
We offer training with modern cars and experienced instructors. You'll receive both theory and practical lessons in a safe environment.
Start your journey towards getting your license today!

trailer-korekort.title: Trailer Driving License
trailer-korekort.subtitle: (Category B/E)
trailer-korekort.hero: Gain the right to tow larger trailers – we guide you all the way.
trailer-korekort.cta: Do you need a trailer license for work or leisure?
trailer-korekort.body:
Our trailer courses give you the knowledge and skills needed to tow safely.
Theory, practice, and exam – we’ll guide you through it all.

traktor-korekort.title: Tractor Driving License
traktor-korekort.subtitle: (Category T)
traktor-korekort.hero: Get your tractor license quickly and easily with us.
traktor-korekort.cta: Need a tractor license for agriculture or work?
traktor-korekort.body:
Our tractor courses offer professional training and hands-on experience.
Ideal for young people and adults working in agriculture.

generhvervelse-korekort.title: Retake of Driving License
generhvervelse-korekort.processTitle: How to get your license back
generhvervelse-korekort.hero: We’ll help you reclaim your license.
generhvervelse-korekort.cta: Need to reacquire your license after revocation?
generhvervelse-korekort.body:
We offer targeted programs for those reacquiring their license.
Personal guidance and instruction to help you pass again.

section1.title: 1. Collection and Processing of Personal Data
section1.description: When you use our price calculator or fill out a contact form on Arzonic Agency's website, we collect and process the following information:

list.name: Name
list.details: Any details you provide in your message or request

section1.note: This information is used solely to respond to your inquiry, prepare a quote, and follow up if necessary.

section2.title: 2. Data Retention and Deletion
section2.description: Your data is stored securely and confidentially.

list.noCustomer: If no customer relationship is established, your data will be automatically deleted after 30 days.
list.customer: If you become a customer, we will retain your data only as long as necessary to provide our services or comply with legal obligations.

section2.note: You may request early deletion by contacting us at mail@arzonic.com.

section3.title: 3. Disclosure of Information
section3.description: We do not share your information with third parties unless it is necessary to fulfill your request (e.g., a subcontractor). If this is the case, it will only be done with your prior consent.

section4.title: 4. Your Rights

list.access: Access the data we hold about you
list.delete: Request deletion of your data (unless retention is required by law)
list.withdraw: Withdraw your consent to data processing

section4.note: To exercise your rights, contact us at mail@arzonic.com.

section5.title: 5. Consent
section5.description1: By submitting your information through our website, you consent to the processing of your data as described above.
section5.description2: You may withdraw your consent at any time by contacting us. If there is no legal reason to retain your data, it will be deleted upon request.

section6.title: 6. Data Security
section6.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, misuse, or disclosure.

section7.title: 7. Updates to This Policy
section7.description: We reserve the right to update this Consent & Privacy Policy. The most recent version will always be available on our website.

TermsModal.title: Terms of Service
TermsModal.effectiveNote: These terms apply to all agreements entered into after this date.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.description: These terms apply to all services and products provided by Arzonic Agency to our clients. By using our website or services, you agree to these terms.

section2.title: 2. Services
section2.description: We provide digital consultancy and ready-made solutions including web development, 3D design, and maintenance. Scope is agreed individually.

section3.title: 3. Payment and Invoicing
section3.description: Payment is due upon invoice unless otherwise agreed. Payment terms: 8 days net. Late payments may incur fees and interest according to law.

section4.title: 4. Intellectual Property
section4.description: All materials developed by Arzonic remain our property unless otherwise agreed in writing. The client receives a usage license.

section5.title: 5. Liability and Limitations
section5.description: We disclaim responsibility for indirect losses, third-party software issues, and force majeure events.

section6.title: 6. Cooperation and Changes
section6.description: The client must respond in a timely manner. Changes must be agreed in writing. Lack of cooperation may affect delivery.

section7.title: 7. Termination
section7.description: Ongoing agreements can be terminated with one month’s notice. Immediate termination may occur in case of material breach.

section8.title: 8. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
section8.description: Disputes are governed by Danish law with jurisdiction in the Court of Hillerød.

section9.title: 9. Changes to Terms
section9.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms. The latest version is always available on our website.

Footer.sloganSince: With you all the way - since 2017

q1.title: How long does it take?
q1.answer: It depends on the complexity of the project. A simple landing page can typically be ready in 1–2 weeks, while a custom web application or a 3D-enhanced solution may take 4–8 weeks or more. We always provide a realistic timeline at project start.

q2.title: Is maintenance included?
q2.answer: We offer both one-time solutions and ongoing maintenance. You can choose a support plan where we handle updates, security, and hosting – or we can hand it all over to you with full documentation.

q3.title: Can I edit content myself?
q3.answer: Yes! Most of our solutions include a user-friendly CMS or dashboard, allowing you to manage text, images, and content on your own. If preferred, we can also build static solutions with zero maintenance needs.

q4.title: What if I need new features later?
q4.answer: We build with scalability in mind. It's easy to add features or expand the solution later, and we're happy to help – whether it's bookings, integrations, e-commerce or something else.

SEO.titleHome: Top Driving School | Get Your Driver's License Safely
SEO.descHome: Welcome to our modern driving school focused on safety, flexibility, and personal instruction. Sign up online today.
SEO.titlePrices: Driving License Prices | Transparent Packages with No Hidden Fees
SEO.descPrices: Check our driving license prices and compare packages. From Basic to Platinum – find the one that suits you best.
SEO.titleContact: Contact Us | We're Ready to Help You Move Forward
SEO.descContact: Have questions? Contact our friendly team for assistance with registration, pricing, or general inquiries.
SEO.titleTilmelding: Sign Up for Driving Lessons | Start Your Journey Today
SEO.descTilmelding: Fill out our registration form and begin your driving course easily. Quick, simple, and without obligation.
SEO.titleInformation: Driving License Info | FAQs and Rules Explained
SEO.descInformation: Find answers to the most common questions about driving licenses, regulations, lessons, and tests. Always updated.
SEO.titleTeachers: Meet Our Driving Instructors | Experienced and Dedicated
SEO.descTeachers: Read about our skilled and experienced instructors who ensure safe and effective driving lessons from day one.
